metadata.Title: CVE-2017-20006 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
UnRAR 5.6.1.2 and 5.6.1.3 has a heap-based buffer overflow in Unpack::CopyString (called from Unpack::Unpack5 and CmdExtract::ExtractCurrentFile).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-20006` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libunrar5 - 1:5.6.6-2build1
unrar - 1:5.6.6-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unrar-nonfree package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:5.6.6-2build1').
